sourcesContent:
import TranscribeFromAudio from "./TranscribeFromAudio"; import ImgtoText from './ImgToText'; import styled from "styled-components" import { StyledContentTextInput, StyledH2Form, StyledTrasncriberSpan, StyledTagInput, StyledLabelForm, StyledSectionInput, StyledSpanInput, StyledH1Input, StyledLabelLN, StyledDivForPages, AdvanceImg } from "./StyledFormInputs"; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import Dropdown1To10 from "../Dropdown1To10"; import PositivityDropdown from '../PositivityDropdown'; import AgeDropdown from '../AgeDropdown'; import POVDropdown from '../POVDropdown'; import useStorage from "../useStorage"; import ApproveBtn from "./ApproveBtn"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router"; import arrowBack from "../../img/arrowBack.svg" import { ArrowBack, ArrowImage } from "./arrowBack"; import advance0 from "../../img/advance0.svg" import advance1 from "../../img/advance1.svg" import advance2 from "../../img/advance2.svg" import advance3 from "../../img/advance3.svg" import advance4 from "../../img/advance4.svg" const obj = () => ({ id: 0, date: "", dreamContent: "", dreamName: "", emotionTags: [], peopleTags: [], placesTags: [], generalTags: [], isLucid: false, lucidClarity: null, lucidCohesion: null, lucidControl: null, isNightmare: false, nightmareIntensity: null, nightmareReaction: {fightBack: false, run: false, hide: false, freeze: false,}, positivityScore: null, personalScore: null, age: "", pov: "", isUnique: true, seriesName: "", situationIRL: "", prideScore: null, personalInterpretation: "", }) const advancement = { a: "flex", b: "none", c: "none", d: "none" }; const StyledForm = styled.form` display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center; gap: 8px; `; const StyledSpan4Radio = styled(StyledSpanInput)` display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; justify-content: center; @media (min-width: 768.1px){ flex-direction: row; } `; function AddADreamForm (){ const [addDreamFormState, setAddDreamFormState] = useState(obj()); const [advance, setAdvance] = useState(advancement) const { updateStorage, exportToBrowser, dreams } = useStorage(); // const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); updateStorage(addDreamFormState); setAddDreamFormState(obj()); exportToBrowser(); // navigate("/journal-page"); } const click2Continue = (e, step) => { e.preventDefault(); setAdvance({a: "none", b: "none", c: "none", d:"none", [step]:"flex"}); window.scrollTo(0,0); } const id = dreams.length+1; function click2GoBack (e, step){ e.preventDefault(); setAdvance({a: "none", b: "none", c: "none", d:"none", [step]:"flex"}); } const styledSubmit = { all: "unset", borderRadius: "19px", backgroundColor: "#265CAE", color: "#e2d351", fontSize: "20px", fontWeight: "800", display: "flex", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "center", width: "180px", padding: "12px 20px", border: "2px solid #D1E2F9", margin: "15px 0 25px 0" } return( ADD A DREAM Or start typing Dream Content {setAddDreamFormState({ ...addDreamFormState, dreamContent: e.target.value, id: id, date: `${(new Date()).getDate()}/${(new Date()).getMonth()+1}/${((new Date()).getYear())-100}` }); }}/> click2Continue(e, "b")} style={{display: advance.a}} /> click2GoBack(e, "a")} style={{display: advance.b}}> Name & Tags What would be a good name for the dream? {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, dreamName: e.target.value})}}/> What emotions have you experienced? {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, emotionTags: e.target.value})}}/> Who was there in your dream? {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, peopleTags: e.target.value})}}/> Where were you in the dream? {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, placesTags: e.target.value})}}/> General Tags {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, generalTags: e.target.value})}}/> click2Continue(e, "c")} style={{display: advance.b}}/> click2GoBack(e, "b")} style={{display: advance.c}}> Lucid And Nightmare {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, isLucid: e.target.value})}}/> Clarity: {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, lucidClarity: e.target.value})}}/> Cohesion: {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, lucidCohesion: e.target.value})}} /> Control: {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, lucidControl: e.target.value})}}/> {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, isNightmare: e.target.value})}}/> Intensity: {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, nightmareIntensity: e.target.value})}}/>

Reaction

{ setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, nightmareReaction:{ ...addDreamFormState.nightmareReaction, run: e.target.checked}})}}/> Run { setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, nightmareReaction:{ ...addDreamFormState.nightmareReaction, fightBack: e.target.checked}})}}/> Fight Back { setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, nightmareReaction:{ ...addDreamFormState.nightmareReaction, hide: e.target.checked}})}}/> Hide { setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, nightmareReaction:{ ...addDreamFormState.nightmareReaction, freeze: e.target.checked}})}}/> Freeze click2Continue(e, "d")} style={{display: advance.c}}/> click2GoBack(e, "c")} style={{display: advance.d}}> Your Insight Positivity: {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, positivityScore: e.target.value})}}/> Personal Score: {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, personalScore: e.target.value})}}/> Age {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, age: e.target.value})}}/> POV {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, pov: e.target.value})}}/>

Was it a unique dream?

{setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, isUnique: e.target.checked})}}/> {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, isUnique: !e.target.checked})}}/> Name The Series {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, seriesName: e.target.value})}}/> What Would've You Done In This Situation In real Life {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, situationIRL: e.target.value})}}/> Pride in actions? {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, prideScore: e.target.value})}}/> Your interpretation, lessons learned from the dream + hidden or underlying messages {setAddDreamFormState({...addDreamFormState, personalInterpretation: e.target.value})}}/> ) } export default AddADreamForm;
